sub_title: High Performance & Strategy Manager for Multisports, at Saudi  Olympic Center
summary:
- Participated, worked as National Coach and Manager at 7 Olympic Games - Summer Olympics , Winter Olympics and Paralympics . 
 - Won 5 Olympics & Paralympics medals with teams & athletes in my direct responsibility and coaching at 2 Summer Olympic Games, 1 Winter Olympic Games and 2 Paralympic Games.
 - Won 10 World Championships medals with my teams and athletes at World Championships (Summer, Winter & World Para)

I am a strategically minded and highly motivated High Performance Manager & Coach with an exceptional track record in driving athletic performance as a manager and coach across a number of different sports at the highest levels of international competition.

With over 25 years’ experience working with international athletes and teams competing at the highest level for countries including Great Britain, Australia ,Oceania Islands,   the Netherlands, Switzerland and Saudi Arabia , I am able to provide a visible impetus in the delivery of medals and maximisation of athletic technique and fitness at Olympic, Paralympic and  World level.

Currently working with the Saudi Olympic Training Centre / Olympic & Paralympic Committee , I provide the necessary leadership, planning and organisation skills to coordinate a cohesive performance strategy ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
Competition Experience & Medal Achievements:

o	7 Olympic Games (Winter & Summer & Paralympics): Bronze Medal (winter) & Silver and Bronze Medals (summer)
        2 Summer Paralympic Games - 2 gold medals 
o	10 IAAF Athletics World Championships: 2 Silver Medals & 5 Bronze Medals
o	4 Athletics European Championships: 1 Gold Medal & 1 Silver Medal
o	3 Commonwealth Games: 1 Gold Medal & 2 Bronze Medals
o      4 World & European Indoor Championships: 3 Silver Medals & 1 Bronze Medal
o	3 FIBT Bobsleigh World & European Championships:  2 Silver Medals & 2 Bronze Medals
